title: Constant lag spike
body:
Lately i'm having some heavy lag spikes.

I have a costant 50 ping then sundelly for 2 - 3 sec it jump to 800 - 1000, making the game very frustating on heavy action.

Router is new and provvider work fine... any suggestion?

replies.body: Sudden input delays like that can be due to packet loss or a routing problem.  My suggestion in this case would be to run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for an overview.  There could also be a router issue such as setting that could be getting in the way.  Let me know what results you get and we'll go from there!
